round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around rnds 18-20 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around fasten_off and weave in all ends securely felting instructions set washing machine to low water level hot water heavy duty agitation and add a drop or two of mild liquid soap such as ivory liquid place crocheted hat in mesh laundry bag in washer along with old denim jeans let the machine agitate the hat for about 5 minutes then check to see how it is felting do not let the water drain out or go to rinse cycle but continue to check every 5 minutes until hat has reached desired amount of felting sample hat took about 10 minutes to felt keep resetting machine
